name: Pyrgos
description:
Pyrgos is a very minimalistic tower defense game. It has a little tutorial so you'll probably  learn how to play right away! Just select the tower you want to buy at the bottom of the screen then place it near the path. After you are prepared, press play to start the enemies waves.

I made this game a few years ago when I was an exchange student at WPIwith a collegue, Tim Calvert, for a Game Design class hosted by Brian Moriarty. It uses an javascript engine called Perlenspiel that is basically a grid that you can change colors and handle clicks/mouse/keyboard events.

Just download and then execute the cover.html (or game.html) to play the game!

Commands: Mouse to interact with the shop and palce towers
